aka: 自閉症の私たちが見ている世界
自閉症患者的內在世界(台)

cast.name: 克里斯·帕卡姆 Chris Packham

director.name: 乔·迈尔斯科夫 Joe Myerscough

trans_title: 自閉症の私たちが見ている世界
自閉症患者的內在世界(台)
introduction: By teaming up with top film-makers, graphic designers, animators and musicians, Chris helps a group of autistic people create short films to reveal to their family and friends how they're truly feeling inside.Since sharing his own autism diagnosis with the world, naturalist and presenter Chris Packham has been flooded with letters and emails from other autistic people, frustrated that their friends, families and co-workers don't understand them. And in this series, Chris wants to bridge the gap. By teaming up with top film-makers, graphic designers, animators and musicians, Chris helps a group of autistic people create short films to reveal to their family and friends how they're truly feeling inside - what's really going on in their autistic minds. He helps an autistic comedian reveal to her mum what's really going on inside her head, gives a non-speaking autistic man the chance to take his message to the world and visits the only state school in the country exclusively for autistic girls. —BBC- CreditsPresenter: Chris PackhamEditor: Sabrina BurnardEditor: James BicknellMusic: Ty UnwinProduction Manager: Shiva TalwarExecutive Producer: Amanda Lyon
